name: The Beautiful Endurance
description:
This is my entry for Paint Jam 2017, developed over the course of 48 hours with GameMaker: Studio.

Note: I originally made this as a Windows executable from GameMaker: Studio, and exported it as a HTML file later without much testing. If issues arise in the browser version of the game, please let me know!

How long can you survive The Beautiful Endurance? Test your skill against an endless rotation of ten different minigames and three difficulty modes.

Will you set a personal best?

Will you mess up and fall short?

You have three lives. Go.

Instructions: Use the mouse to move, click and drag objects in the various minigames. Trial and error may be a good way to solve each of the minigames, but reading the prompt may give you an idea of how to complete it.
